text: This is a list of works by the English phonetician Lilias Armstrong. It also contains references to contemporary reviews of her books. ==Works by Armstrong== ===Books=== ====An English Phonetic Reader==== Reviews: * ====A Burmese Phonetic Reader==== Reviews: * * ::Response: ====Handbook of English Intonation==== Reviews: * * * * * ====The Phonetics of French==== Foreword by Daniel Jones.
